title: Chile 1973 Shock Therapy Implementation Network
description: Map the personnel and institutional connections between the Chilean coup, Chicago Boys economists, and Powell Memo infrastructure
source_document: The Capture Cascade - Part 2: The Accelerant.pdf
research_notes: Generated from systematic analysis of disaster capitalism documentation. Focus on concrete timeline events, personnel connections, and institutional capture mechanisms.
research_areas: September 11, 1973 - Pinochet coup enabling radical restructuring
Chicago Boys training at University of Chicago under corporate-funded programs
Privatization timeline: state industries, trade barriers, social spending cuts
Milton Friedman 1975 visit and endorsement of economic program
Movement of Chilean advisors to Powell-created think tanks and consulting firms
